messages.subject: war ideas for 5 y.o.
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the link Sandra, I am printing it out as I write this. Trevor has been really into that show on the History channel called Mail call about the
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the link Sandra, I am printing it out as I write this.
Trevor has been really into that show on the History channel called "Mail
call" about the military and history of wars.
He can rattle off all sorts of facts about weaponry. How many rounds per
minute a Gatlin gun can shoot and so on, he recognizes several different
styles of guns now, it's amazing.
That timeline is going to be fun for him to look at I bet.

Ren
"The answers aren't important really...
What's important, is knowing all the questions."
-Zilpha Keatley Snyder
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
